content: पुत्रका, --पुत्रिका {@--1@} A daughter. {@--2@} A doll, puppet. {@--3@} A daughter appointed to raise male issue for a father who has no sons; अपुत्रऽनेन विधिना सुतां कुर्वीत पुत्रिकां . यदपत्यं भवेदस्यां तन्मम स्यात्स्वधाकरम् ... {@--4@} The cotton or down of the tamarisk. {@--5@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Anything little or small of its kind; as in असिपुत्रिका, खङ्गपुत्रिका &c.
